title: Your stars today
text:
See what the stars have in store for you today.

FRIDAY OCTOBER 25, 2019

ARIES March 21-April 20 ***

It’s a good day to get deep and meaningful with a special loved one in your life. And prepare for some substantial changes, as a work project or financial matter heads off in a serious new direction.

TAURUS April 21-May 21 ****

Today, avoid skimming the surface and being superficial when you’re communicating with others. Take the time to look beneath the surface to discover – and understand - what’s really going on.

GEMINI May 22-June 21 ***

You’re keen to provide assistance but promising more than you can deliver could be a problem today. If you are passionate and productive, then you’ll get things done without disappointing others.

CANCER June 22-July 23 ***

When it comes to a relationship with a loved one, you need to skip superficialities and go a lot deeper Crabs. It’s time to uncover the real reasons why a current situation is experiencing problems.

LEO July 24-Aug 23 ****

It’s a wonderful day for work and business, as Venus and Pluto boost your concentration and people skills. So make sure you capitalise on positive opportunities that come your way.

VIRGO Aug 24-Sep 23 ***

Today’s stars highlight study, travel, friendships, community connections and stimulating conversations. So it’s the perfect time for curious Virgos to talk, text and tweet up a storm.

LIBRA Sep 24-Oct 23 ****

Family relationships, business transactions and money matters are all favoured today Libra, as long as you are patient. It’s also a good time to mix business matters with plenty of pleasure.

SCORPIO Oct 24-Nov 22 ****

Today’s stars make for super intense connections with family and friends, as you engage in meaningful conversations and exchange profound insights. Which is just what Scorpios like to do.

SAGITTARIUS Nov 23-Dec 21 ***

Take a chill pill Sagittarius! The planets are activating your privacy zone. So you’re definitely overdue for some quiet solo time, where you can recharge your rundown batteries from within.

CAPRICORN Dec 22-Jan 20 ****

The stars favour friendships and networking, as you feel extra generous and supportive towards your peer group. For some Capricorns, a casual relationship moves to a much deeper level.

AQUARIUS Jan 21-Feb 19 ***

With the planets revving up your reputation zone, it’s your time to shine. Public speaking and performing are favoured, as you display your leadership skills and creative talents for all to see.

PISCES Feb 20-March 20 ***

Many Pisceans will be drawn to foreign friends and international connections. Whatever you choose to do, expect a busy day full of interesting interactions and plenty of intense conversations.

YOUR DAY

Venus and Pluto highlight passionate partnerships, intense relationships and complex subjects.

HAPPY BIRTHDAY

You love being organised and taking charge. When it comes to your goals for the future, being open and flexible are the keys to a successful 2020.

Copyright Joanne Madeline Moore 2019
description: See what the stars have in store for you today.
